ObjectParser

This class converts an object into a variety of differnt formats.

Summary
ObjectParser
This class converts an object into a variety of differnt formats.
Functions
ObjectParser
Initializes the Object
to_object
Convert the string that is formatted like an object into an actual object.
to_param
This function will format a string serveral differnt ways depending on the parameters provided.
to_query_string
This function takes an object and explodes it into a query string as a web post would expect.
parse_object
Create a recursive iteration over the objects and add them to a query string.

Functions

ObjectParser

ObjectParser = function(obj)

Initializes the Object

to_object

ObjectParser.prototype.to_object = function(obj)

Convert the string that is formatted like an object into an actual object.

Parameters

objString that is formatted like an object.

to_param

ObjectParser.prototype.to_param = function(p,
v,
containing_property)

This function will format a string serveral differnt ways depending on the parameters provided.  If no v parameter is provided it returns

bar&

If there is a containing property then it returns

foo[bar]=baz&

Otherwise it returns

bar=baz&

Parameters

pstring representing the property to use in the query string
vstring representing the value of the property.
containing_propertyused if the p and v variables are part of an array.

Returns

partial query string

to_query_string

ObjectParser.prototype.to_query_string = function()

This function takes an object and explodes it into a query string as a web post would expect.

parse_object

ObjectParser.prototype.parse_object = function(obj,
containing_property)

Create a recursive iteration over the objects and add them to a query string.

Parameters

objis the object to parse
containg_propertyis a string used to add pretty formatting to query strings for sub-objects.
